sentence.Network_en: By using phenomenological method, Moritz Geiger found axiological aesthetics.

sentence.Network_en: Wittgenstein's aesthetics is a Ethical one, including axiological meaning and absolute happiness of transcendental meaning.
sentence.Network_cn: 维特根斯坦认为,美学是伦理学的美学, 它包含了价值论的意义,蕴含着绝对幸福的人生超越性意义.

sentence.Network_en: The comtemporary Axiological Philosophy will offer unlimited prospect of bringing the three doctrines into peaceful coexistence.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天,价值论哲学有可能成为打通阻碍我们哲学理论创新的中、西、马哲学壁垒的一把钥匙.
